H0.text: Who was manager of Sheffield Wednesday when they won the League Cup in 1991, beating Manchester United in the final . Ron Atkinson

A4.text: Under Ron Atkinson, Wednesday won the League Cup and promotion to the First Division before departing for Aston Villa in July 1991.
